maker: Ground color painted by Antoine Capelle, Painted reserve and cameos attributed to Pierre-André Le Guay, Gilded by Etienne-Henri Le Guay, et al
title: Cup (gobelet litron)
description: Cup (gobelet litron); Ground color painted by Antoine Capelle (French, active 1745 - 1800), Painted reserve and cameos attributed to Pierre-André Le Guay (French, active 1772 - 1818), Gilded by Etienne-Henri Le Guay (French, 1719/1720 - about 1799), et al; Sèvres, France; 1781; Soft paste porcelain, brown ground color (? merde d'oie), polychrome enamel decoration, enamels in imitation of jewels, gilding and gold foils; 7 x 9.4 x 9.4 cm (2 3/4 x 3 11/16 x 3 11/16 in.); 81.DE.28.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
